source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video shows a static, aerial view of a 3D architectural model. The model depicts a large industrial or research facility with numerous buildings of various sizes and shapes. The complex is enclosed by a perimeter wall, and the surrounding landscape is a flat, brown expanse.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback:
The camera is rotating counter-clockwise while moving upwards and backwards in an aerial shot, so "static" has been removed.

A reddish-brown wall surrounds the core area, with other building complexes distributed outside the wall.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The camera is rotating counter-clockwise while moving upwards and backwards in an aerial shot, so the term "static" has been removed from the description. Additionally, a reddish-brown wall encloses the core area, with other building complexes situated outside the wall.

Additionally, a reddish-brown wall encloses the core area, with other building complexes situated outside the wall.
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This video features a dynamic, aerial view of a 3D architectural model. The camera rotates counter-clockwise while moving upwards and backwards, showcasing a large industrial or research facility with numerous buildings of various sizes and shapes. A reddish-brown wall encloses the core area, while other building complexes are situated outside the wall, surrounded by a flat, brown landscape.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video features a dynamic, aerial view of a 3D architectural model. The camera rotates counter-clockwise while moving upwards and backwards, showcasing a large industrial or research facility with numerous buildings of various sizes and shapes. A reddish-brown wall encloses the core area, while other building complexes are situated outside the wall, surrounded by a flat, brown landscape.

generated_critique: The caption correctly identifies the camera's movement and the general subject, but it misses the opportunity to describe the chronological reveal of the architectural model, which is the primary "action" in the video. Instead of just stating the camera moves, the description could detail what comes into view as a result of that motion. For example, if the video starts focused on a central courtyard, the caption could state, "The view opens on a central courtyard, then pulls back and rotates to reveal the surrounding multi-story office buildings and the connecting sky-bridges between them." The description of "numerous buildings" is too generic; a better caption would specify the types of structures revealed, such as "low-lying warehouses, a taller administrative tower, and several cylindrical processing tanks." Additionally, the current caption assumes the model is entirely static. If there were any animated elements, such as tiny vehicles moving on the integrated road network or simulated smoke rising from a smokestack, these key instances of subject motion have been completely overlooked and should be included.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: The video begins with a focus on a central courtyard, then gradually pulls back and rotates to reveal the surrounding multi-story office buildings and the connecting sky-bridges between them. As the camera continues to move, it unveils a variety of structures, including low-lying warehouses, a taller administrative tower, and several cylindrical processing tanks. The model is brought to life with animated elements, such as tiny vehicles moving along the integrated road network and simulated smoke rising from a smokestack, adding dynamic action to the scene.
